original_text: As for the likeness of their faces, each had a human face. The four had the face of a lion on the right side, the four had the face of an ox on the left side, and the four had the face of an eagle.
korean_text: 그 얼굴들의 모양은 넷의 앞은 사람의 얼굴이요 넷의 오른쪽은 사자의 얼굴이요 넷의 왼쪽은 소의 얼굴이요 넷의 뒤는 독수리의 얼굴이니

sentences.original_text: As for the likeness of their faces,
The four had the face of a lion on the right side,
the four had the face of an ox on the left side,
and the four had the face of an eagle.
